name: tuberous sclerosis
definition: A syndrome that is characterized by the growth of numerous noncancerous tumors in many parts of the body. [url:https\://ghr.nlm.nih.gov/condition/tuberous-sclerosis-complex#synonyms]

clinicalTrials.title: Topical Sirolimus Ointment for Cutaneous Angiofibromas in Subjects With Tuberous Sclerosis Complex
Dose-Ranging Efficacy and Safety Study of Topical Rapamycin Cream for Facial Angiofibroma Associated With Tuberous Sclerosis Complex
